response_parsed.title: Containerizing Serverless Handlers Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to containerize serverless functions utilizing FastAPI, a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understand the benefits of containerizing serverless applications
Install and set up the required tools (Docker, Ubuntu, FastAPI)
Create a FastAPI application with at least one serverless handler
Build a Docker image for the FastAPI app and serverless handler
Deploy the containerized FastAPI serverless handler to your desired cloud platform

code_examples.code:
```
# Build Docker image
$ docker build -t fastapi-serverless:latest .
```

version_notes: This guide is specifically tailored for Python 3.12+ and FastAPI versions compatible with it.
Ensure your development environment has the required versions installed.
caveats: Remember to replace 'my_handler' and adjust any necessary configuration depending on your specific use case.
Be mindful of the cloud provider's requirements when deploying the containerized FastAPI app.
